sample_name: DRP000317_gut metagenome from 20 korean individuals_korean gut microbiota_

publications.title: The gut microbiota of Colombians differs from that of Americans, Europeans and Asians.

projects.title: Gut metagenome from 20 Korean individuals
projects.abstract: In this study, we investigated the overall composition of the gut microbiota and its host specificity and temporal stability in 20 Koreans using 454-pyrosequencing with barcoded primers targeting the V1 to V3 region of the bacterial 16S rRNA gene.

meta.TITLE: Korean gut microbiota
meta.name: DRS000427
meta.sample comment: In this study, we investigated the overall composition of the gut microbiota and its host specificity and temporal stability in 20 Koreans using 454-pyrosequencing with barcoded primers targeting the V1 to V3 region of the bacterial 16S rRNA gene.
